summary: An Ordinance amending Sections 5, 35, 40, 42, 48, 50 and 52 and repealing Section 47 of Ordinance No. 21670, entitled "An Ordinance relating to the municipal water supply system of The City of Seattle, regulating the use of water therefrom, providing for the sale of same, fixing the price thereof and providing a method for collecting rates therefor, and providing penalties for violations of this ordinance", which became a law under the provisions of the City charter on the 23rd day of August, 1909.
